product_name: Vibram FiveFingers KSO Evo Cross-Training Shoes - Men's
long_description: Part of the Vibram Max-Feel category, the Vibram FiveFingers KSO Evo Cross-Training Shoes offer lots of ground feedback so you can get the most out of the barefoot running technique. KSO Evo shoes have a max sole thickness of 4.7mm. Individual toe slots enhance dexterity, control and stability to deliver a natural running motion. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Moisture-wicking, antimicrobial Drilex(R) nylon covers the 2mm EVA midsoles providing comfort and cushioning underfoot. A reinforced upper and speed lace allows for easy entry and a snug fit while the zig-zag patterned sole provides grip and flexibility in all directions. Vibram XS Trek rubber outsoles povide good traction. Vibram FiveFingers KSO Evo Cross-Training Shoes are machine washable in cold water; air dry only. To determine size, stand with heels against a wall and measure from the wall to the tip of the longest toe; use the longest toe length in conjunction with the size chart.
short_description: Part of the Vibram Max-Feel category, the Vibram FiveFingers KSO Evo Cross-Training Shoes offer lots of ground feedback so you can get the most out of the barefoot running technique.
